head.title: Adjust {{FileFormatUp}} page orientation in {{EnvName}} apps
head.description: With {{ProdFullName}}, tweak {{FileFormatUp}} page layouts (portrait or landscape). Handle PDFs, Word files, Excel sheets, PowerPoint decks, Visio drawings, images, archives, and more effortlessly.

header.title: Page orientation tweaks for {{FileFormatUp}}
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} brings practical tools to {{EnvNameShort}} apps. Developers can upgrade their projects by managing key file formats and adjusting {{FileFormatUp}} page layouts.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: {{ProdShortName}} Overview
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a toolset for handling documents across 50+ formats, including PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Visio, images, and archives. Merge, split, extract, reposition, swap, remove, or rotate pages to suit your needs.

more_features.title: Versatile document management
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} delivers a strong lineup of tools for managing content in over 50 file formats with fast, reliable performance.

feature_1.title: Blend multiple file types
feature_1.content: Fuse PDFs, Word docs, slides, spreadsheets, Visio files, images, and archives. Fine-tune the process for great results.

feature_2.title: Organize document pages
feature_2.content: Shift, swap, or cut pages to streamline your document structure.

feature_3.title: Adjust page setup
feature_3.content: Turn pages to a custom angle or flip between portrait and landscape.

feature_4.title: Pull pages into new files
feature_4.content: Grab one page or a batch and save them as a fresh file anywhere.

formats.title: Modify page orientation across formats
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} handles 50+ file types, letting you adjust documents with ease using a range of functions.
